overview:
Dr. Jinhua (Jeff) Xi is a senior IT executive and serves as the CTO & Chief Architect at GageIn. He is responsible for the overall architecture, design and implementation of the GageIn platform. Jeff has over 14 years of proven track record in designing and developing large scale enterprise software, SOA applications, and web platforms. Prior to GageIn, Jeff was a Technical Executive and Architect at IBM Software Group. He was the architect of several products in the IBM WebSphere and Rational product families. He has also successfully provided business solutions to customers worldwide. In 2002, Jeff co-founded Olymtech Corp, a provider of SaaS platform and solutions for SMB companies. He served as CTO at Olymtech Corp. from 2002 through 2005.

Dr. Xi received his Ph.D degree in Computational Sciences from Vanderbilt University. He also holds a Master’s degree in Computer Sciences from Vanderbilt University and a Master’s degree in Applied Physics from Tsinghua University. He has published over 20 referred papers in internationally renowned journals and owns one patent.
